reviews.customers_say: Customers find the 1920s dress well-made with a stunning design, comfortable, and amazing for its price. They appreciate its perfect fit, with one noting the length is appropriate for the era. The dress receives mixed feedback about its size, with some finding it true to size while others say the small size is too big. While many find it flattering, one customer notes it's extremely unflattering on fairer-skinned women. The dress's fragility is a concern, with several customers describing it as extremely fragile. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 1920 Era Dress
items.body: I’m absolutely in love with this 1920s Great Gatsby-style dress! The design is stunning, capturing the glamour and elegance of the era perfectly. The quality is fantastic, with beautiful detailing and a flattering fit. It’s perfect for any vintage-inspired event or costume party. I felt like I stepped straight out of the Roaring Twenties! Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Natty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic quality! Fit perfectly and received a lot of compliments. Happy I chose this one.
items.body: Fantastic quality! Fit TO THE T... perfect. It held up beautifully all night, dancing and everything. I did a lot of research and looking before I decided on this one. VERY happy I chose this one. Received many compliments and it was a little different than the other ladies outfits, so it stood out. I am ready to wear it again! Read more
items.author: Hannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall great dress!
items.body: The color is beautiful and not too pale, and the dress itself is much higher quality than I expected. It feels less like a costume, and more like an actual dress which is nice. There are a couple of small issues though. One, the straps are just a tad too big so they have a tendency to fall down sometimes, but it’s not that bad. Two, the tassels on the bottom of mine are very fragile and come out easily, but as long as your careful not to step on them while putting the dress on it’s not a big deal. Overall the dress is beautiful and is perfect for any 1920s themed event that you could possibly go to!!! Read more
items.author: Christina Garlock

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great price for a themed wedding
items.body: this was my back up dress for a 1920s themed wedding. The first dress literally came apart as we were heading out the driveway. I love the pattern and the low back. two things to note. The shoulders kept slipping off and the back is low so a normal bra will not work. It was very comfortable and I got a lot of compliments For reference I am 5'4" weigh 150 and wore a medium Read more
items.author: Julie Des Lauriers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I usually wear a 2x got one size up and it worked.
items.body: Love it! Love it! Beautiful dress! Fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Linda S.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but very small
items.body: Very pretty dress. Nice beadwork. But very small and short. Could barely get it over the upper half and when I did, it barely made it over my bum! Read more
items.author: Donna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The price
items.body: I love the dress! Read more
items.author: Olga B.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Look elsewhere
items.body: So cheap in person, don’t even bother wasting your money. The price is way too expensive for the terrible quality it is. Also extremely unflattering on fairer skinned women. Read more
items.author: ynelem

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blacksilver, Blackgold, Rosegold. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
